original_text: While Peter was still speaking these words, the Holy Spirit came on all who heard the message.
korean_text: 베드로가 이 말을 할 때에 성령이 말씀 듣는 모든 사람에게 내려오시니

sentences.original_text: While Peter was still speaking these words
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로가 아직 이 말들을 말하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: the Holy Spirit came on all
